results.title: Spa packages | Tallinn Viimsi SPA hotel, Estonia
results.content: New Year at Viimsi SPA · Accommodation with unlimited visit to the sauna center · SPA-holiday for two with unlimited Atlantis H2O visit · SPA18+ package for two.
results.raw_content:
![](https://pubads.g.doubleclick.net/activity;dc_iu=/82349501/DFPAudiencePixel;ord=1;dc_seg=546662858)

# Spa Packages

## New Year at Viimsi SPA

For New Year’s Eve, set off toward Viimsi to spend both a relaxing spa vacation and a lively New Year’s Eve on the naturally beautiful peninsula. Enjoy a festive dinner accompanied by live music or welcome the new year in the Black Rose pub with dance music.

![](https://www.spatallinn.ee/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/Pidulik-aastavahetus-Viimsi-SPA-hotellis-400x400.jpg)

## Accommodation with unlimited visit to the sauna center

Enjoy refreshing stay with unlimited access to our spa and sauna center, featuring 13 unique saunas, a sports swimming pool and a fully equipped gym.

![](https://www.spatallinn.ee/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Majutus-VIimsi-SPA-s-koos-piiramatu-saunakeskuse-kulastusega-400x400.jpg)

## SPA-holiday for two with unlimited Atlantis H2O visit

Spa holiday with accommodation, buffet breakfast, unlimited visit to spa and sauna center and Atlantis H2O Aquapark.

![](https://www.spatallinn.ee/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Atlantis-H2O-Aquapark-Tallinn-Viimsi-400x400.jpg)

## SPA18+ package for two

Spa-holiday with visit to water and sauna paradise [SPA18+](http://www.spatallinn.ee/en/adult-spa18/). Dedicate some time to yourself because there is nothing more important than the ability to enjoy some time alone or in the company of your friends. Here you can enjoy a special quiet and calm, since [SPA 18+](http://www.spatallinn.ee/en/adult-spa18/) is intended solely for adults.

![](https://www.spatallinn.ee/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/Tallinn-Viimsi-SPA-18-131-400x400.jpg)

## Family SPA-holiday with Atlantis H2O Aquapark visit

Spa holiday for whole family with accommodation in family room, buffet breakfast, unlimited visit to spa and sauna center and Atlantis H2O Aquapark. For customers who have purchased the Atlantis H2O family package, we offer a great opportunity to visit Atlantis H2O Aquapark for 3 hours free of charge after check-out.

![](https://www.spatallinn.ee/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/Atlantis-H2O-Aquapark-veepark-30-400x400.jpg)

## SPA design

Design your own spa package! Your own tailor made package will quarantee perfect spa experience and holiday your friends envy. Package for 1 night with possibility to choose amoung luxuirious spa-treatments and unlimited access to spa and sauna center.

![](https://www.spatallinn.ee/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/Viimsi-SPA-Spa-Disain-400x400.jpg)

## Spa Romance

Romantic package with heart-warming dual massage and unlimited visit to exclusive SPA18+ sauna center.

![](https://www.spatallinn.ee/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/Viimsi-SPA18-13-400x400.jpg)

## Wellness Package

Package for 1 night with spa treatment, breakfast and dinner and unlimited access to sauna center.

![](https://www.spatallinn.ee/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/Viimsi-SPA-wellness-pakett-400x400.jpg)

## Beauty Day Spa

Day Spa package with use of sauna center, swimming-pool and gym and 2 beauty treatments

**Price from 110 € / person**

![](https://www.spatallinn.ee/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/Viimsi-SPA-pakett-Kevad-sydames-400x400.jpg)

## Beauty package

3 treatments with a special price  
(163 € when treatments purchased separately)

**Price 127 € includes 3 treatments**

![](https://www.spatallinn.ee/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/Viimsi-SPA-Ilukeskus-näohoolitsus-400x400.jpg)

## SPA package for men „Trés Homme“

**Three spa-treatments for a special price 127 €**

RELAXING BACK MASSAGE  
FACE TREATMENT HYDRADERMIE TRÉS HOMME  
PEDICURE

![](https://www.spatallinn.ee/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/Spaapakett-meestele-Tallinn-Viimsi-SPA-400x400.jpg)

## Romantic Day Spa for two

Day-SPA package day for two with dual massage, use of private sauna with a jacuzzi and a glass of sparkling wine.

**Price from 123 € for 2 persons**

![](https://www.spatallinn.ee/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Romantiline_Päevaspaa_duaalmassaaz_Viimsi-SPA-Ilukeskus-400x400.jpg)

## Day SPA18+Emperor Caesar’s Relaxation

Relaxation package for men.

**Price from 89 € person**

![](https://www.spatallinn.ee/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/SPA18-Hoolitsused-meestele-massaaž-400x400.jpg)

## Day SPA18+ Oriental harmony

Day Spa package with use of SPA18 +, relaxing oriental back massage and glass of bubbly.

**Price from 75 € person**

![](https://www.spatallinn.ee/wp-content/uploads/2016/08/Viimsi-SPA-Tai-massaaž-400x400.jpg)

## Day SPA18+ Spa Romance

Luxurious Day Spa for romance lovers with unlimited use of SPA18 +, a private four-post canopy bed, a Repêchage body treatment with massage or oriental massage for two, a bottle of sparkling wine and snacks.

**Price from 209 € for two persons**

![](https://www.spatallinn.ee/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/Viimsi-SPA18-paevaspaa-Romantika-spaas-400x400.jpg)

## Day SPA18+ Spa vacation

Day Spa package with use of SPA18+, treatment from choice and glass of bubbly.

**Price from 69 € person**

![](https://www.spatallinn.ee/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/Tallinn-Viimsi-SPA18-päevaspaa-kehahoolitsused-ja-Ilubaar-luksusbrand-400x400.jpg)

## Day SPA18+ Wonderful Expectation

Ideal pampering for an expectant mother. Day Spa package with use of SPA18+, Thai massage and welcome drink.

**Price from 79 € person**

![](https://www.spatallinn.ee/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/Imeline-ootus-Viimsi-SPA18-päevaspaa-400x400.jpg)

## Day SPA18+ Cleopatra

Day Spa package with unlimited use of SPA18+, a spa-ritual with massage for the body, sparkling wine and snacks.

**Price from 129 € person**

![](https://www.spatallinn.ee/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/Tallinn-Viimsi-SPA-18-paevaspaa-Subariit-spaas-400x400.jpg)

## Sauna Fridays with sauna master and cold beer

Every Friday on 8 pm

**Price 9 € / person**

![](https://www.spatallinn.ee/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/Viimsi-SPA-saunarituaalid-Sauna-Reede-400x400.jpg)

## Seminar & SPA18+

One-day seminar package with coffee break, lunch and use of SPA 18+

**Price from 55 € per person**

![SPA18+ spaapidu fotode autor Urmas Volmer](https://www.spatallinn.ee/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/SPA18-spaapidu-fotode-autor-Urmas-Volmer-11-400x400.jpg)

## Accommodation

Conference at Tallinn Viimsi SPA hotel – an inspirational place for constructive ideas!

![](https://www.spatallinn.ee/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/Tallinn-Viimsi-SPA-renovated-superior-TWIN-or-DBL-room-10-400x400.jpg)

### Information

results.title: Atlantis H2O Aquapark in Viimsi for adults | Sauna centreAtlantis ...
results.content: For bigger quests of Atlantis H2O Aquapark visitors we offer free entrance to Tallinn Viimsi SPA sauna centre. 7 different saunas and pools available.
results.raw_content:
![](https://www.facebook.com/tr?id=625085312019389&ev=PageView&noscript=1)

# Sauna center

Atlantis H20 Aquapark is connected to **[Tallinn Viimsi Spa and Sauna Center](https://www.spatallinn.ee/en/spa-and-sauna-center/)**  and swimming pool via a gallery.

For an additional fee visitors to the Aquapark will be able to enjoy various spa and sauna pleasures. The additional fee for Spa and Sauna Center is 10 € / per person and 20 € per family ticket.  
It is possible to redeem the combo ticket for the Aquapark + Sauna Center at the Atlantis H20 ticket office. If you wish, you can add a visit to the Sauna Center to your Aquapark visit at the Aquapark’s NOMNOM bar, and pay upon exiting.

In the luxurious spa and sauna center our guests can enjoy the caressing pleasures of the water paradise. Besides the steam bath and Finnish saunas you can experience the salt stone, juniper sauna, ritual sauna, smoke sauna, infrared-yoga sauna and tropical sauna. Our sauna masters take care of pleasant atmosphere during regular [sauna rituals](http://www.spatallinn.ee/en/spa-and-sauna-center/sauna-rituals/), making a sauna visit an exclusive and memorable experience! Between sauna visits you can cool yourself in the spa pools and jacuzzis and enjoy refreshing cocktails in the [spa bar](http://www.spatallinn.ee/en/wine-dine/sauna-cafe-bar/). For our little customers, there is a bathing pool in the center and a separate pool for floating babies. For older customers the spa includes a relaxing pool for peaceful bathing and an outdoor pool with cool water for strengthening your health. In the near vicinity of saunas and pools, stylish spa treatment rooms are located, from where you can find an excellent possibility to nourish your body by enjoying different massages and body treatments.

### Outdoor sauna

### Natural salt stone sauna

### Finnish sauna

### Juniper sauna

### Steam sauna

### Steam-salt sauna

### Children’s sauna Water bear

We have created a children’s sauna Water bear for younger spa lovers. The water bear is a funny animal living in Atlantis H2O Aquapark, who has come across the sea to the sauna center to provide company for the smallest water lovers in the sauna. In the Water bear sauna, you feel as if you are sitting in a submarine, and through the portholes you can see the exciting underwater world. The sauna has a pleasantly low temperature and safe seats.

### Information

### Contact and location

**Atlantis H2O Aquapark**  
Randvere tee 11, Viimsi 74001  
Harju county, Estonia  
+372 666 7045
